body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting DataDrive Solutions. My name is Justin Edwards.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jane. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad about the data management issues at the Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Jane. Can you provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one zero nine eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm your date of birth for security reasons?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My birthdate is the twenty-third of December, nineteen seventy-four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane, for sharing that information. I will look into the data management issues at the Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Have a great day, Jane.
